title: Kevin Volland - Wikipedia
snippet: On 17 August 2023, Volland signed a contract with Union Berlin ahead of their inaugural Champions League campaign. In April 2025, with his contract running until 2026, it was announced that Volland would leave Union Berlin in the summer to return to former club 1860 Munich.
